attributes.action: Impose compulsory drug tests for all serving MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In response to the furore regarding David Cameron's use, or not as the case may be, of cannabis by a number of MP’s, I would like to suggest the introduction of compulsory drug testing for all Serving MP’s.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
